trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 파생 된 컨트롤을 비주얼 웹 디자이너에서 디자인 타임 지원을 제공 하는 디자이너에 대 한 기본 클래스로 사용는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref> 추상 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: In the Visual Web Designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 비주얼 웹 디자이너에서 사용자가 소스 뷰에서 디자인 뷰로 전환 하는 경우 컨트롤을 설명 하는 태그 소스 코드에서 파생 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>클래스 구문 분석 되 고 디자인 화면에 컨트롤의 디자인 타임 버전이 만들어집니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 소스 뷰로 다시 전환 되는 경우 디자인 타임 컨트롤 태그 소스 코드에 유지 되 고 웹 페이지에 대 한 태그를 편집 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDesigner class serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: ListControlDesigner 클래스 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> 에서 파생 된 컨트롤을 비주얼 웹 디자이너에서 디자인 타임 지원을 제공 하는 디자이너에 대 한 기본 클래스로 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: ListControlDesigner 클래스 속성은 다음과 같은 기능을 제공:- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>속성 반환 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>개체에서 파생 된 개체는 일반적으로 포함 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>디자이너의 상속 트리의 각 수준에 대 한 개체입니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>속성 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> 에서 파생 된 컨트롤의 해당 속성에 대 한 액세스를</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> indicate the fields of the data source that provide the text and value content of the list items, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>텍스트를 제공 하 고 목록 항목의 콘텐츠를 각각 값 있는 데이터 원본의 필드를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: ListControlDesigner 클래스 메서드는 다음 기능을 제공:- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>메서드에서 파생 되는 연결 된 컨트롤을 바인딩하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>디자인 타임 데이터 원본에.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>메서드 디자인 타임에 연결된 된 컨트롤을 렌더링 하는 데 사용 되는 태그를 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>메서드는 디자인 타임 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>구성 요소 연결된 된 컨트롤 컨테이너에서.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> from the control container, resolved to the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>메서드가 반환 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>컨트롤 컨테이너에서 디자인 타임에 해결 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A>컨트롤의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view and design the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>보고 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> 에서 파생 되는 연결 된 컨트롤을 디자인 하는 디자이너를 준비 하는 메서드</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>때이 메서드가 호출 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>연결된 된 컨트롤 변경 되었습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove additional properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>메서드는 추가 속성을 제거에서 추가 속성을, 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> 에서 파생 된 연결된 된 컨트롤의 그림자 속성 추가 하는 데 사용 됩니다</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 내부적으로 생성 하는.NET Framework는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>에서 파생 되는 연결 된 컨트롤을 만들 때의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>디자인 화면의 클래스.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너의 디자이너 작업 목록 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> 디자이너와 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임 데이터 원본에 지정된 된 컨트롤을 바인딩합니다.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> base class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> object to reference the design-time data source, then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and then restores the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties to their original values.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner>기본 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>메서드 설정은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>개체 디자인 타임 데이터 원본 참조를 호출 합니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드 및 복원은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>속성을 원래 값입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class, however, the DataBind method has no functionality, because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> objects were just added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 그러나에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>클래스, DataBind 메서드에 기능이 없습니다 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>개체에 추가 되었으므로 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The associated control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref>, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에서 파생 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref>, 또는 해당 컨트롤의 복사본입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data text field of the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 데이터 텍스트 필드를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataTextField property sets or retrieves the markup to use for the design-time representation of the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: DataTextField 속성을 설정 하거나 런타임에 컨트롤의 디자인 타임 표시를 사용 하는 태그를 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This provides access via the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> property of the associated control, which corresponds to the field of the data source that provides the text content of the list items.
trans-unit.target: 이렇게 하면 디자이너를 통해 액세스할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>목록 항목의 텍스트 내용을 제공 하는 데이터 원본의 필드에 해당 하는 연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField*> of the list control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField*>목록 컨트롤의.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data value field of the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 데이터 값 필드를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataValueField property provides access via the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> property of the associated control, which indicates the field of the data source that provides the value content of the list items.
trans-unit.target: DataValueField 속성 디자이너를 통해 액세스할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>목록 항목의 값 내용을 제공 하는 데이터 소스 필드를 나타내는 연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField*> of the list control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField*>목록 컨트롤의.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임에 컨트롤을 나타내는 데 사용 되는 HTML을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object is data-bound, the GetDesignTimeHtml method clears the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection and adds a <xref:System.String> message indicating the control is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에서 파생 된 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>개체는 데이터 바인딩, GetDesignTimeHtml 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>컬렉션 추가 <xref:System.String>데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤이 나타내는 메시지입니다.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: If the associated control is not data-bound and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection is empty, the GetDesignTimeHtml adds a <xref:System.String> message indicating the control is unbound.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우 연결된 된 컨트롤은 데이터에 바인딩되지 않습니다 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>GetDesignTimeHtml는 추가 컬렉션을 선택 하지 않으면는 <xref:System.String>컨트롤에 바인딩된 아님을 나타내는 메시지입니다.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, the GetDesignTimeHtml calls its base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음는 GetDesignTimeHtml 태그를 생성 하는 기본 메서드를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the markup used to render the control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>에서 파생 된 컨트롤을 렌더링 하는 데 사용 하는 태그를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref> 디자인 타임에.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: 특정 데이터 멤버를 확인 하는 연결 된 컨트롤 컨테이너에서 데이터 원본 구성 요소를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns `null` if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is not found, or if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> with the same name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>메서드가 반환 되 `null` 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>속성이 없습니다 또는 경우에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>같은 이름의 존재 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> cannot be resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control, the GetResolvedSelectedDataSource returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A>연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성은 GetResolvedSelectedDataSource 반환 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>인터페이스를 포함 하는 디자인 타임 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> 확인할 수 없습니다</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource*>, resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember*> of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>디자인 타임에 포함 된 <> </> *>로 확인는 <> </> *> 연결된 된 컨트롤의.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 컨트롤 컨테이너에서 데이터 원본 구성 요소를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The GetSelectedDataSource method returns `null` if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is not found, or if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> with the same name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: GetSelectedDataSource 메서드가 반환 `null` 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>속성이 없습니다 또는 경우에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>같은 이름의 존재 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface and containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource*> of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 개체는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>디자인 타임을 포함 하 고 인터페이스 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource*>연결된 된 컨트롤의.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너를 표시, 편집 및 연결된 된 컨트롤을 디자인을 준비 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너를 사용 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> 에서 파생 된 컨트롤을 렌더링 하는 준비가 되 면 디자이너 호스트 Initialize 메서드를 호출

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Initialize 메서드 및 기본 메서드 속성을 구성 하 고 디자이너의 작업에 필요한 이벤트를 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, that is associated with this designer or is a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: `component` 매개 변수는에서 파생 된 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>,이 디자이너와 연결 된 또는 해당 컨트롤의 복사본입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> that implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 파생 되는 컨트롤의 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref> 구현 하는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에 대 한 데이터 원본 변경 될 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>에서 파생 되는 연결 된 컨트롤을 연결 하는 기본 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>현재 데이터 원본에 개체 및 컨트롤 연결 된 데이터 원본의 서로 다른 경우, 디자인 타임 태그를 업데이트 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceChanged 메서드는 현재 데이터 원본에 연결한 후 디자인 타임 태그를 업데이트 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤에 대 한 데이터 원본 변경 될 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>에서 파생 되는 연결 된 컨트롤을 연결 하는 기본 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>현재 데이터 원본에는 클래스 및 컨트롤 연결 된 데이터 원본의 서로 다른 경우, 디자인 타임 태그를 업데이트 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method of the designer unconditionally updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>디자이너의 메서드는 현재 데이터 소스에 연결한 후 무조건 디자인 타임 태그를 업데이트 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of `forceUpdateView` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 값 `forceUpdateView` 는 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the design-time markup is to be unconditionally updated.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>디자인 타임 태그를 무조건 업데이트할지 인지 나타내는.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 이 매개 변수는 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove additional properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 추가 속성을 제거 또는 속성에 표시 되는을 추가 하는 디자이너에서 사용 된 **속성** 표 또는 연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성을 숨기 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 디자이너에서 파생 된 메서드를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>숨기려면 디자이너에서 구현 하는 해당 디자인 타임 속성을 사용 하 여 다양 한 컨트롤 속성 및 속성을 추가 하거나 속성을 제거 하는 메서드는 **속성** 눈금.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object, the PreFilterProperties adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter> attribute to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 파생 된 컨트롤에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>개체를 추가 하는 PreFilterProperties는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter>특성을 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added or shadowed properties to expose for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 컬렉션의 <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>디자인 타임에 연결된 된 컨트롤에 대 한 노출 하려면 추가 또는 숨겨진 속성이.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated control should render its default action lists.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 컨트롤의 기본 작업 목록을 렌더링 해야 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The UseDataSourcePickerActionList property returns `false` so that a data source dropdown is not displayed with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu.
trans-unit.target: UseDataSourcePickerActionList 속성은 반환 `false` 와 데이터 소스 드롭다운이 표시 되지 않습니다 수 있도록는 **데이터 소스 선택** 메뉴 항목에는 **일반적인 작업** 상황에 맞는 메뉴입니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead, this menu item displays the **Choose Data Source** dialog box, which allows the user to select a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 대신,이 메뉴 항목 표시는 **데이터 소스 선택** 를 선택할 수 있는 대화 상자를 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 항상 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
